description: The Silent Hill 2 Remake is a faithful retelling of the 2001 classic. But while it's remarkably loyal to its source material, developer Bloober Team also took liberties in making this remake its own, with some differences more subtle than others. Here's a breakdown of Silent Hill 2 Remake's biggest differences.
title: Silent Hill 2 Remake's Biggest Differences

description: Are you picking up the collector's edition of Metaphor: ReFantazio
title: Unboxing the Metaphor: ReFantazio COLLECTOR'S EDITION
Armor Expert Reacts To Warhammer 40K DARK ANGELS Models

description:
There are so many references, easter eggs, and nods to the wider Warhammer 40,000 lore squeezed into Space Marine 2.

We're back exploring more of the game's secrets, Easter eggs, lore and amazing details.

From the fate of the Ultramarine Varellus and the statue of Sanguinius, to the Tzeentch cultists and even some clumsy tech priests.

00:00 Intro 
00:17 The Statue of Sanguinius
00:58 Remembering Varellus
01:30 Emperor's Teeth
01:57 Lance of Jove
02:58 Tech Priests' Binaric
03:40 Wargear Details

04:52 Not all is dust
05:42 Resurrecting Rubric Marines
06:29 Recaff Rations
06:53 A Commissar Falling Back?
07:42 Watchful Servitors
08:24 Grimdark manual labour
08:56 Squishy meat sacks

09:55 Someone call OSHA
10:17 Heretical Firearms
10:51 Long Las Sniper
11:14 Care for your Chimera
title: 19 More Incredible Details In Warhammer 40K: Space Marine 2

description:
Jeff Grubb and friends break down today's top stories in video games! 

#gmm #gamemessmornings #giantbomb #videogamenews
title: Game Mess Mornings 10/11/24

description:
Her legacy lives on!

Play the next series of Tomb Raider adventures in this remastered collection of the Darkness Trilogy.

A new three-game collection featuring Tomb Raider: The Last Revelation, Tomb Raider: Chronicles, and Tomb Raider: The Angel of Darkness, each remastered with improved visuals, modern control options, Photo Mode, trophies and achievements, and more. 

Developed and published by Aspyr, this new title will release on Nintendo Switch, PlayStation®5, PlayStation®4, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, and PC via Steam and the Epic Games Store on Feb. 14, 2025, and is available to pre-order today for $29.99!
title: Tomb Raider IV-VI Remastered - Official Announcement Trailer

description:
Even if you're a long time Atlus or Persona fan, Metaphor: ReFantazio switches things up in some unexpected ways, which is why we found ourselves having to learn all new tricks and considerations while playing. And now its time to pass them on to you. We'll be keeping this as spoiler-free as possible.

#gaming #metaphorrefantazio  #gamespot
title: Metaphor - 12 Things I Wish I Knew
